overview: On a typical Monday morning, four co-workers compete for bragging rights as they share stories of their wild and crazy weekends. But this is no ordinary carpool, these characters share the most intimate and hardcore details of their sexcapades in order to out do the others. So, who will win the title by demonstrating their depraved and debauchery filled weekend? Will it be our girl next door Sandy (Kaylani Lei), Bob the sarcastic seasoned veteran, Jimmy, the shy new guy or Sue, the overly moral compass of the group? Jump in the carpool lane to find out...
tagline: Start your week off with a bang!
title: Carpool
